TreeLogicFunction.Name: Compare
TreeLogicFunction.Description: Compares the two strings in a case sensitive or insensitive manner.

Argument.Name: StringOne
Argument.Description: One of the strings to be compared.

Argument.Name: StringTwo
Argument.Description: One of the strings to be compare.

Argument.Name: ComparisonType
Argument.Description: Indicates if the Comparison should be case sensitive or insensitive.
